list.item: Medications: Take prescribed medications as advised.
Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility for Immunosuppression treatment.
For Fever of > 42 degree Celsius or onset of chest pain/breathlessness contact Emergency.
Come in once a month to get a checkup of your weight and iron deficiency.
